name: Cargolux 747-4R7F [LX-RCV] Daylight Takeoff from Calgary ᴴᴰ
description:
PLEASE READ DESCRIPTION!

Here we have a Cargolux 747-400 making a rare daylight takeoff from Calgary International Airport, for Luxembourg. Sorry for the lousy filming, I had my tripod tension settings wrong. 

So, I've made a decision regarding my new camera. I'm returning it. It's like some of you said in my last video, there was no real difference in quality, and my current one does the job just fine. So... Yeah. :P I have 1 or 2 more videos that I shot with it, and I'll upload those soon.

Thanks for watching! Please comment, rate, and subscribe!
____________________________________________________

FLIGHT INFO
Airline: Cargolux Airlines International (CV CLX)
Aircraft: Boeing 747-400F (744)
Registration: LX-RCV
Route: YYC-LUX
Callsign: Cargolux 775 Heavy
Runway used: 17L
FlightAware: http://flightaware.com/live/flight/LXRCV
